name: Uber Squad (Ricardo Reyes Paz)
description:
Kill bad guys, get more squad units, get more score and pew pew, that's all.      


It features:

  • Online leaderboard
  • Rogue-Like style level generation
  • Juicy Effects
  • Fast-paced action
  • And much much fun i guess, lmao

I wanted to do more on this game, but i'm really not motivated at all, so instead i just released this as it is, it's fully playable anyways.

Originally made for the GMTK Jam 2021

Enjoy it!
